fields.description: Something incorrect being acknowledged and repaired.
Something old being brought up to date.

Mistakes maven Craig Silverman was kind enough to feature my work here in his column. I agree with him totally that my work is only an experiment—and that a wise course would be the development of corrections-related expansions for the most popular blogging software.
After I threw this post up, the ever-resourceful Aaron Bycoffe alerted me to a more robust tool designed to tackle this same task published by Jacob Kaplan-Moss.
